comments.body:
feels like this test should also verify that "foo" contains more than one cert?

EDIT: actually NVM, this is verified in TestTryLoadCertChainFromDisk.

should be `t.Fatalf`?

some of the similar calls bellow should be `t.Fatalf`, otherwise we are passing `nil` values to some functions.

Good catch, I copied that from some of the other tests. I've updated it for my tests and other tests where I think it should be `Fatalf`: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/97266/commits/625491fe5ab296185448937464427ae1c3532840
